sentences.en: 6-millimetre film was used because it offered clearer freeze frames than video tape.
sentences.cn: 采用6毫米胶片是因为它的定格图像要比录像带更加清晰。

sentences.en: CNGC has also introduced the improved HongJian 9 A with a more advanced millimetre wave guidance system.
sentences.cn: CNGC也 已经推出改进的红箭-9A采用更先进的毫米波制导系统.

sentences.en: One millimetre to the left and who knows?
sentences.cn: 往左一毫米呢?谁知道 呢 ?

sentences.en: One second of arc movement is one thirtieth of a millimetre.
sentences.cn: 一弧秒的移动是一毫米的三十分之一.

sentences.en: The calculations were exact to the nearest millimetre.
sentences.cn: 计算的精确度几近毫米.

sentences.en: The coats, made of polythene sheet 0.05 millimetre thick, are fitted on the sheep after shearing.
sentences.cn: 这种绵羊穿的罩衣, 是用0.05毫米厚的聚乙烯薄膜制成的,在剪完羊毛之后给羊穿上.

sentences.en: The creature is a tiny centipede, just 10 millimetres long.
sentences.cn: 那个生物是一只很小的蜈蚣，只有10毫米长。

sentences.en: The equipment includes two black and white cameras that operate with an millimetre ( 8 mm ) chip.
sentences.cn: 这项装置包括用8毫米的芯片驱动的两台黑白相机.

sentences.en: The millimetre thick displays weigh only a few grams and operate on two to five volts.
sentences.cn: 这种几毫米厚的显示屏只有几克重,工作在2～5伏的电压下.

sentences.en: The silicon chips are less than a millimetre thick.
sentences.cn: 这些硅片厚度不足一毫米。

sentences.en: The total amount of pollen was measured more accurately by 30 millimetre deameter globes.
sentences.cn: 用直径30毫米的球形收集器,可以更准确地测定花粉的总量.

sentences.en: When the little sixteen - millimetre film is blown up to standard size, the image often blurs.
sentences.cn: 把十六毫米的微型胶卷放大到标准尺寸, 图象常会模糊.

trans.tran_en: a unit for measuring length. There are 1,000 millimetres in one metre.
